Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In this way they obtained appreciable changes in body weight ( increased from 50 to 70 g after forty days at a dose of 5 mg per day of anabolizing agent ) , but most of all they found histological changes due to " regenerative " changes in the muscle tissue , which however maintained its myopathic characteristics in the control animals that were not treated with the anabolizing agent .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Myopathy (in control animals) |

The paragraph describes histological changes in muscle tissue, specifically in control animals that were not treated with an anabolizing agent. These changes are referred to as "myopathic characteristics." Therefore, the disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is myopathy.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Myopathy (in control animals) |

The paragraph mentions "histological changes due to 'regenerative' changes in the muscle tissue" in control animals, which are described as "myopathic characteristics." Therefore, the only clear disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is myopathy.
